original_text: After Jacob had sent his family across, he also sent all his things across the stream.
korean_text: 그들을 인도하여 시내를 건너가게 하며 그의 소유도 건너가게 하고

sentences.original_text: After Jacob had sent his family across
he also sent all his things across
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 그의 모든 것들을 건너편으로 보냈다
